original_text: And Solomon made affinity with Pharaoh king of Egypt, and took Pharaoh's daughter, and brought her into the city of David, until he had made an end of building his own house, and the house of the Lord, and the wall of Jerusalem round about.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 애굽의 왕 바로와 더불어 혼인 관계를 맺어 그의 딸을 맞이하고 다윗 성에 데려다가 두고 자기의 왕궁과 여호와의 성전과 예루살렘 주위의 성의 공사가 끝나기를 기다리니라

sentences.original_text: And Solomon made affinity with Pharaoh king of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬이 이집트 왕 바로와 인연을 맺고

sentences.original_text: and brought her into the city of David
until he had made an end of building his own house
and the house of the Lord
and the wall of Jerusalem round about
